DOC.brief_summary: Age-related change of femur is not well-known. The investigators investigated the longitudinal changes of femur.
DOC.detailed_description: Recently, bisphosphonate-related atypical fracture of femur (AFF) is paid attention in clinicians. Almost all AFFs were occurred in thicker cortical thickness. But age-related change of femur is not well-known. The main objective of this study is to reveal the age-related change of femur.
DOC.criteria: Osteoporosis or osteopenia patients who presented to our hospital Patients without osteoporosis or osteopenia
